2051350.name: PITCHvr™ Vision - College
2051350.description:
The PITCHvr™ Vision - College DLC is an extensive data base of pitches for training College level baseball players in conjunction with the main PITCHvr™ Vision software that includes Fastballs, Curveballs, Sliders, and Change ups. (The data base that is included with PITCHvr™ Vision contains only High School level pitches. )

Please note that while PITCHvr™ Vision - College adapts to the players skill level during sessions, the training philosophy has been called "practice dirty, play clean." This means that during training in the virtual world, the player will be challenged by some pitches that are beyond the physical capabilities of the best college pitchers in baseball. The best college hitters in the world will be challenged, so leave your ego on the bench.

This pitch data set includes hundreds of 3/4 arm release pitches with the following types and speed ranges in MPH (miles per hour):

> Change up....................................................CH..............79-83 MPH
> Slurve.............................................................CU1.............74-78
> Hybrid between Slurve and 12-6.........CU2.............71-75
> 12 to 6 curve...............................................CU3.............69-73
> Cutter.............................................................FC................86-95
> Four seam fastball.....................................FF.................86-95
> Split finger fastball....................................FS.................86-95
> Two seam fastball.....................................FT..................86-95
> Slider with more run and less depth..SL1.................77-81
> Slider with less run and more depth..SL2................81-85
